00022 #ifndef CCN_BTREE_CONTENT_DEFINED
00023 #define CCN_BTREE_CONTENT_DEFINED
00024 
00025 #include <sys/types.h>
00026 #include <ccn/btree.h>
00027 #include <ccn/ccn.h>
00028 #include <ccn/charbuf.h>
00029 
00030 /**
00031  *  Structure of the entry payload within a leaf node.
00032  */
00033 struct ccn_btree_content_payload {
00034     unsigned char magic[1];     /**< CCN_BT_CONTENT_MAGIC */
00035     unsigned char ctype[3];     /**< Type */
00036     unsigned char cobsz[4];     /**< Size in bytes of ContentObject */
00037     unsigned char ncomp[2];     /**< number of name components */
00038     unsigned char flags[1];     /**< CCN_RCFLAG_* */
00039     unsigned char ttpad[1];     /**< Reserved until 20 Aug 4147 07:32:16 GMT */
00040     unsigned char timex[6];     /**< Timestamp from content object */
00041     unsigned char actim[6];     /**< Accession time, Timestamp format */
00042     unsigned char cobid[8];     /**< Where the actual ContentObject is */
00043     unsigned char ppkdg[32];    /**< PublisherPublicKeyDigest */
00044 };
00045 #define CCN_BT_CONTENT_MAGIC    0xC0
00046 #define CCN_RCFLAG_LASTBLOCK    0x80
00047 #define CCN_RCFLAG_STALE        0x01
00048 
00049 /**
00050  *  Logical structure of the entry within a leaf node.
00051  */
00052 struct ccn_btree_content_entry {
00053     struct ccn_btree_content_payload ce;
00054     struct ccn_btree_entry_trailer trailer;
00055 };
00056 
00057 /* Match an interest against a btree entry, assuming a prefix match. */
00058 int ccn_btree_match_interest(struct ccn_btree_node *node, int ndx,
00059                              const unsigned char *interest_msg,
00060                              const struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi,
00061                              struct ccn_charbuf *scratch);
00062 
00063 /* Insert a ContentObject into a btree node */
00064 int ccn_btree_insert_content(struct ccn_btree_node *node, int ndx,
00065                              uint_least64_t cobid,
00066                              const unsigned char *content_object,
00067                              struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *pc,
00068                              struct ccn_charbuf *flatname);
00069 
00070 /* cobid accessor */
00071 uint_least64_t ccn_btree_content_cobid(struct ccn_btree_node *node, int ndx);
00072 int ccn_btree_content_set_cobid(struct ccn_btree_node *node, int ndx,
00073                                 uint_least64_t cobid);
00074 /* cobsz accessor */
00075 int ccn_btree_content_cobsz(struct ccn_btree_node *node, int ndx);
00076 
00077 #endif
